403.message: The email or password you entered is incorrect.

actionButtons.message: Action buttons for popup and advanced notification window

addEmailAlias.message: Add an alias to your email address

addEmailAliasToolTip.message: Add a nickname in the popop window like Jason's Email instead of longboringemail@gmail.com

advancedNotificationToolTip.message: Notifies you of all unread emails, read the whole email or delete it without opening your browser or a Gmail tab! Essentially brings the functionality of the top popup window into the bottom notification window!

advancedNotificationTryItOutInstructions.message: Mark one (or atleast two for this demo) of your emails as unread then click here and wait to see the advanced notification window and try out the email preview by clicking on an email summary!

alsoExtraFeaturesForGoogleCalendar.message: Donate once and also unlock the extra features of my $1

alwaysDisplayExternalContent.message: Always display external content (such as images)

alwaysDisplayExternalContentToolTip.message: When you open an email that contains externally linked images, Gmail usually doesn't display the images automatically. This behavior is designed to help protect your privacy; if the images were displayed automatically, it could potentially allow the sender of the email to see that the images are being fetched, and therefore know when you've read their message. Note: There is no concern if you do not click to open the email for previewing or if you mark it as read or for spam etc. instead of previewing it

archive_readToolTip.message: Mark a mail as read when you archive it

autoDetectAccounts.message: This app will auto-detect the accounts you're signed into.

backgroundOfNotificationTooltip.message: Sets the background color of notification popup

canceledInAppPurchase.message: Try PayPal instead? or contact me for questions at

changeThisDomain.message: To change this email domain now $1

changeThisDomain2.message: sign out and sign in as a different user

chromePlaced2ButtonLimit.message: Chrome has placed a 2 button limit!

collapseEmailAccountsToolTip.message: Use this option to give you a better overview of all unread email accounts so that you can choose which ones to expand with the arrow

colorMessage.message: A donation is required to save these colors!

colorSubject.message: Sample email to play with colors

contactsMessage.message: Hover over the photos to zoom in

continueWithoutFeatures.message: Continue using this extension with lots of options but without these extra features.

conversationViewToolTip.message: Sets whether emails of the same topic are grouped together

creditCardOrPaypal.message: You can use your credit card or PayPal to

description.message: Get desktop notifications, read, listen, archive or delete emails without opening a Gmail tab & easily manage multiple accounts

developingMore.message: and I'm working hard on more of your suggestions...

differentSoundsToolTip.message: You can already select a sound for all your email accounts but this features let's you choose different sounds per email account, label or person!

doNotNotifyMeOfUpdates.message: Do not notify me of updates

doNotShowNotificationIfGmailTabActive.message: Do not show notification if you're already in your Gmail tab

doNotShowNotificationIfGmailTabActiveToo.message: Useful if you're 'living' in your Gmail window :) and you probably see the new email at the same time as my notification

doNotShowNotificationsWhenBrowserClosed.message: Do not show notifications when browser window is closed

doNotShowNotificationsWhenBrowserClosedT.message: Your Chrome browser will still run in the background with a tray in the icon, BUT, the notifications will NOT be shown!

drawAttentionToBrowser.message: Blink Chrome in the taskbar on Windows or bounce the Chrome icon on a Mac (Beta)

drawAttentionToBrowserTooltip.message: This will happen only if the focus is not on the browser. Useful if using multiple workspaces... in Windows: Blinks Chrome application in the taskbar. On Mac: Bounces the Chrome icon

duplicateLabelWarning.message: I recommend only selecting 1 of the 3 main labels (Inbox, Important, All Mail) or else you will get duplicates!

emailPreviewToolTip.message:
If this option is checked and you click anywhere on an email within the popup (ie. the summary), than a larger email preview area will open.
If unchecked then clicking will open the email inside Gmail's webpage instead

emailSummaryToolTip.message: The small snippet of text below each email displaying the first few lines of the email in the popup window

enableLanguageDetectionToolTip.message: Speak in the language that is detected in the email by using the detectlanguage.com service!

enableVoiceInputToolTip.message: Adds a microphone at the bottom of a new message or reply box in your Gmail webpage

extraFeaturesClicked.message: You tried using one of these extra features...

failureWithInAppPurchase.message: Failure with transaction! Try PayPal instead?

failureWithPayPalPurchase.message: Canceled or failure with transaction! Try Google Checkout instead?

fetchContactsIntervalToolTip.message: Set this to higher value if you have a lot of contacts or a slow internet

grantAccessAgainToolTip.message: Useful only if you have multiple sign-in accounts and you want to grant permission to each one for the photos

groupByLabelsToolTip.message: Group and sort unread emails by the labels you have chosen to monitor. This will add a small header with the label above your emails like 'Inbox' etc. in the popup preview and the advanced notification window

hearEmailToolTip.message: Select which parts of the email you want to hear... from (sender), subject or message (body) of email

helpMeTranslate.message: Can you help me with the translations? $1 the correct ones!

helpSupport.message: to help support the author of this extension!

hideByJasonToolTip.message: Hide by Jason Savard in the popup window

hideMarkAsReadEmails.message: Hide emails that you 'mark as read'

hideSentFrom.message: Hide email signatures from the summary like 'Sent from my ...'

hideSentFromToolTip.message: Check this to hide email signatures sent from devices such as 'Sent from my iPhone or Blackberry' etc.

hideUnreadCountToolTip.message: Hide the unread count number from the browser action icon

iconTooltip.message: The icon to use for the popup button

identifyEmailAccountsWithColors.message: Select colors for different email accounts

keepHoveringOverTheBluePlusOne.message: Keep hovering on the blue +1 until the text appears then click it to share on Google+

languageToolTip.message: Changes the display and voice notification language. Note: You might see many languages at once because these are the rules: It will display what I've translated in the language you choose here, if I haven't translated some words it will look for it in the language of your browser, if I haven't translated those it will display it in English.

licenseOnlyValidFor.message: The license will only be valid for users who sign into their Google Account with a

linesInSummaryToolTip.message:
None - Will hide the summary from the top popup window.
# lines - Lines of text to show
Auto adjust - Will set the most number of lines possible to best fit all the unread emails into the top popup window and if necessary add a mini scrolling area to the summary
Auto adjust + images - Will also show any images in the summary. NOT recommended for privacy concerns because sender's could potentially know when you've opened their email since this summary is automatically presented upon clicking the button icon

mailtoLinksToolTip.message: Clicking on mailto links (usually email links) will open in Gmail instead of your regular mail client. Extra permissions are required to parse these links on the sites you visit.

monitorThisLabelToolTip.message: Determines which labels the extension will monitor for new mail

multipleSelectionMac.message: Hold down the command button to select multiple options

multipleSelectionWindows.message: Hold down the control (ctrl) button to select multiple options.

multipleUserLicense.message: Get a multiple user license for your organisation

mustSignInToPay.message: You must sign in to your Gmail and wait for this extension to load!

muteVoiceWhileSleepingToolTip.message: For those who leave their computers and sound on at night... you can check this option to mute the voice notification between the selectable hours

notificationFontSizeTooltip.message: Sets the font size of the event title in the popup notification. Set the smallest for when there is a long event title and set the largest for when there is a short event title

notificationTryItOutInstructions.message: Mark atleast one of your emails as unread then click here and wait to see the notification window!

notificationZoomTooltip.message: Use this to shrink the 'all' the text in the notification window (useful for those with high DPI scaling)

onlyRemoveAfterDonation.message: You can only remove the donation link after making a donation!

openComposeInTab.message: Open compose new mail in a tab

openComposeInTabToolTip.message: Open new mail composing in a tab instead of a small popup window (also applies to mailto links)

openGmailTabToolTip.message: Disables the preview popup window (not recommended) and opens or selects the first Gmail account tab with unread mail

openPopupPreviewIfUnreadToolTip.message: Only shows the preview window when there's unread mail

openThisLabelToolTip.message: Determines where the user will be directed when clicking the email account or extension icon

pollingIntervalTooltip.message: The interval in which to fetch emails

popupWindowZoomToolTip.message: Changes the overall zoom for the popup window (Not the email preview or the notification)

previewingMarksAsReadToolTip.message: Mark a mail as read when previewing it in the popup window

primarySocialPromotionsEtc.message: Primary, Social and Promotions tabs etc.

rateTitle.message: Speed of speech: words per minute

reducedDonationAd_notification.message: Good news long time user! Extras are only $1 click to see/hide this.

reducedDonationAd_popup.message: Good news long time user! You can get the latest $1 for only 50¢

rememeberReadEmailsToolTip.message: Option to show unread and read emails, but it's EXPERIMENTAL - So please do not rate me on this feature until it's out of beta

repeatSoundTooltip.message: Repeats the notification or voice sound if the notification popup window has not been dismissed

replyingMarksAsReadToolTip.message: Clicking the reply button will mark the email as read

richNotificationToolTip.message: Actionable popups, but not obtrusive since they'll disappear in a few seconds on their own if no action is taken. Think of them like notifications on your smartphone. They provide relevant, real-time information but you can choose to ignore any further action until later.

runInBackground.message: Run in background when Google Chrome is closed

runInBackgroundToolTip.message: Continue receiving new email notifications even while your browser is closed! I recommend this only for advanced users.

runInBackgroundWarning2.message: If you disabled background apps in Chrome you can re-enable them by reading the $1

runInBackgroundWarning3.message: You might have to use the $1 from the Gmail login page

selectQuickActionButtonsToolTip.message: Note: This will not hide the buttons in the full email view!

setPositionAndSize.message: Set position and size of popup window

setPositionAndSizeToolTip.message: Override the system defaults for Compose/Reply popup windows and set the position and size of the popup window in pixels

shareTitle.message: Click here to find out more. Note: This message will disappear after clicking here.

shortcutKeysHeader.message: These keys apply only for the top popup window that is activated by the button

showActionButtonsOnHover.message: Only show action buttons when you hover over in the notification window

showActionButtonsOnHoverToolTip.message: I recommend keeping this checked, but, if you have Mac, you may want to uncheck this to leave the action buttons always showing because sometimes the hover does work when the Chrome window is not in focus

showButtonTooltip.message: Show tooltip when hovering over the button icon

showButtonTooltipTooltip.message: Show the next events when hovering over the button icon

showContactPhoto.message: Show contact photos and details inside popup

showContactPhotoToolTip.message: If your contact has a photo it will show it, or even add your own photo for them in your Google Contacts or just hover their empty photo image in Gmail to add a photo. If no photo is found than the default logo will appear instead. Permissions are required to fetch your contacts photos.

showEOM.message: Add a marker to indicate the end of an email summary [EOM]

showEOMToolTip.message: EOM - End Of Message. Useful when receving lots of quick small emails to avoid having to click the summary to see if there is more text in the preview

showEmailAccountToolTip.message: Useful if you're checking 2 or more accounts. Displays the current inbox email account that has received the new unread email notification

showHigherResolutionAttachmentsToolTip.message: Requires extra permissions to fetch the higher resolution images

showIconAnimationToolTip.message: Animates the icon when there is new mail

showLeftColumnWhenPreviewingEmail.message: Show left side column in popup when previewing email

showLeftColumnWhenPreviewingEmailToolTip.message: Note: This column might automatically become hidden if the email is too wide and needs more space

showMarkAsReadEmails.message: Continue showing emails that you 'mark as read'

showNotificationEmailImagePreview.message: Show preview of first image inside email

showNotificationsForOlderDateEmails.message: Show notifications for older dated emails (Useful only for POP3 accounts)

showNotificationsForOlderDateEmailsToolT.message: If unchecked, popup notifications will only occur for your newest emails (recommended for most), but sometimes emails fetched using POP3 will arrive in your inbox after your newest emails and are sorted in the middle of your inbox because of their older dates. If you check this option those emails will also appear in your popup notifications but only to maximum of 20 unread emails in your inbox. Note: If you mark emails as unread they will also popup notifications again!

signInAsUserOfOrg.message: You must $1 with your organisation's email

signInAsUserOfOrg2.message: sign out and sign in to your Gmail

signInToYourAccount.message: Sign in to your account(s) first then reload this page!

spokenWordsLimitToolTip.message: You can stop the speech anytime by clicking on the button or hovering over the notification window. Note: Some speech engines may impose their own spoken word limit

standardNotificationToolTip.message: Notifies you of the last unread email with basic action buttons

supportAndRequestsPrioritized.message: to support me and get your requests prioritized!

textNotificationToolTip.message: Notifies you of the last unread email. Compatible with OS X Notification Center and Growl

thankYouForYourContribution.message: The features are now unlocked. Thank you for your contribution!

timeoutTryAgain.message: Timeout occured when communicating with $1, please try again!

tooManyUnread.message: Sorry, I can only mark $1 or less emails at a time. Please use the Gmail website instead

turnOffRegularGmailChecking.message: Turn off regular Gmail checking and only check Google Apps

unlockFeatures.message: Unlock these features and future ones with a one time donation of any amount and they will be immediately available!

unlockHeader.message: Get the extra features and support your developer

useTheseColorsToolTip.message: Play with the different colors or set them both to the same color to have only one color. Try matching your Gmail theme for this email account or company logo colors. Then check the box below to activate them. This will affect the popup preview and the advanced notification window

voiceNotificationOnlyIfIdle.message: Only if you're away from computer for at least

voiceNotificationOnlyIfIdleTooltip.message: Use this option if you only want to hear the voice when you're NOT using the computer, not in front of it, or if it's idling etc. Recommended by me :)

welcomeMessage.message:
Welcome,

Enjoy this extension right away or take your time exploring its many options.

If you have any issues contact me using the help links before writing a review
... I might actually be able to help :)

whyContributeReason1.message: I put many hours updating and supporting $1 weekly in response to your suggestions

whyContributeReason2.message: I read and provide quick feedback to your comments and reviews

whyContributeReason3.message: You can contribute any amount and i'll be happy!

whyContributeReason4.message: This extension keeps getting great $1, thanks to you!

whyContributeReason5.message: Find out more about me at $1

whyContributeToCalendarReason1.message: Be a more productive Google user for you or your business

writeSomethingNice.message: Replace this text with a nice comment about this app or how or why you use it

xxshareTitle.message: Click here to tell your friends about this great app by choosing a social media share button. Note: This message will disappear after clicking here.
